name: Endless Runner
description:
Controls 🎮:

A - Strafe Left
D - Strafe Right
Q - Turn 90° Left
E - Turn  90° Right
ESC - Pause Menu

Credits 💖:

Static meshes and Pickup Particles by Unreal Engine Starter Content
Pickup SFX  Magic SFX Pro by Sidearm Studios
BG Music Mega Game Music Collection by MuzStation Game Music
Fonts by Google Webfonts
HDRI Image by HDRI Haven

Sidenote 📌:

Inspired by the Endless Runner Blueprint Tutorial by Unreal Engine, written in C++
